card.name: Seraph, Special Snowflake
card.text: {2}{S}: Put an ice counter on target tapped nonsnow, nonland permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow, don't untap during their controllers' untap steps and have "{1}: Remove an ice counter from this permanent."

card.name: Ruler of All That Is and Ever Will Be
card.text: Don't look at me, I can't read it either.

card.name: Rance, Super King
card.text: {B}{R}, {T}: Tap target female creature, planeswalker or adversary, then put a harem counter on it. {1}{B}{R}, {T}, Remove a harem counter from target permanent an opponent controls: Until end of turn, you gain control of that permanent and it gains haste.

card.name: Thugnificent, Voice of Reason
card.text: Whenever an ability of an adversary is activated, you may say "Why?" If that adversary's controller cannot come up with a good answer, counter that activated ability.

card.name: ADV Expansion
card.text: Enchant female Adversary Enchanted permanent cannot be untapped until its creator officially states that the art is not indicative of their breast size.

card.name: Demiurge
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search for a random card from outside of the game and reveal it. If it's a permanent, put a copy of it onto the battlefield. If it's an instant or sorcery, you may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Pim, Meddling Goddess
card.text: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, choose a random player. That player gains control of the spell and may choose new targets for that spell. Whenever a nonland permanent enters the battlefield, choose a random player. That player gains control of that permanent.

card.name: Nix, Phyrexian Scion
card.text: Your deck cannot contain lands. At the beginning of your upkeep, gain 5 life. You cannot gain life in any other way. Pay 2 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
